PPLoc: The Home Page of AAM's Intranet Portal
activities: Place, names, titles, & work telephone numbers (and fax numbers and e-mail addresses) of AAM's European employees on AAM's computer server in Detroit.  Maintain personnel files containing personal information of AAM's European employees in Detroit, etc.

recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities (EU DPAs) located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
